TopicTitle: How do I make a cinematic, and does anyone want to help me?

Articles.Content:
I want to do a KSP cinematic with KopernicusTech planets and the Endurance mod, but I can't get any good free recording programs (Shadow-whatever causes KSP to crash, and OBS doesn't work) working.

Also I'm terrible at writing stories and have no good editing programs, so someone to collaborate with would be nice.

So, any tips/suggestions/etc?
Watch Nassult videos and watch what he does.

I think you are looking for BahamutoD's Camera Tools:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94171-0-25-Camera-Tools-v1-2-%28added-orbit-ref-mode%29-Nov-28?highlight=cinematic+camera

I can be a scriptwriter. I am great at this.

The problem? I have my own projects as top priority, so expect progress or be slow.

i can design crafts, but I have a potato laptop, so you/ other collaborators will have to do most of the filming. I am also good at paper drawing, but that's useless unless you want to see a storyboard.

I think you are looking for BahamutoD's Camera Tools:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94171-0-25-Camera-Tools-v1-2-%28added-orbit-ref-mode%29-Nov-28?highlight=cinematic+camera

+1

Hullcam VDS is also good if you want to get any shots that look like they're inserted from actual cameras onboard the ship.
